text: mēlum, (muḥmiṉkaḷākiya) avarkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷukkiṭaiyil (aṉpiṉ) piṇaippai uṇṭākkiṉāṉ; pūmiyiluḷḷa (celvaṅkaḷ) aṉaittaiyum nīr celavu ceyta pōtilum, avarkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷukkiṭaiyē attakaiya (aṉpiṉ) piṇaippai uṇṭākkiyirukka muṭiyātu - āṉāl niccayamāka allāh avarkaḷiṭaiyē appiṇaippai ēṟpaṭuttiyuḷḷāṉ; meyyākavē avaṉ mikaittavaṉākavum, ñāṉamuḷḷavaṉākavum irukkiṉṟāṉ
